name: 10/10 Would Ride Again
description:
Destroy all your enemies in the most exciting elevator of all time. Stay alive as long as you can.

Introducing "10/10 Would Ride Again", where you play as an everyday self-aware robot. On your way to work, your curiosity finally gets the better of you and you press the "Infinity" button in the office elevator. Before you know it, you are flying in an endless void, with constantly attacking creatures!
